input.sentences: when i was little | i lived next to the water .
i lived in an apartment building with 5 stories .
i used to wake up every day and admire the statue out front .
it was built to honor world war ii .
every day before bed | i would pray in the community chapel next to my building .
output.sentences: When I was young I lived next to the water.
I can remember many stories from the time I lived in that old building.
Every day I would wake up  and stand in front of a statue.
The statue was a world war two memorial.
The entire community would gather on memorial day and pray for the soldiers.
